cause.description:
If you're curious where donations go, please see PETA's Annual Review. I think you'll be happy with all the progress made for animals. http://features.peta.org/Annual-Review-2010/
Remember: You can help animals everywhere by joining PETA's Action Team today: http://bit.ly/action-team.
1. Animals deserve to be treated with compassion.
2. Humans have the responsibility to speak out against cruelty to animals.
cause.name: Animal Rights
